name: Pasta Rosa with Scallops
author: Publix Aprons
summary: Make your mouth water with this savory dish. In just over half an hour, create a culinary masterpiece with a cheesy Alfredo pasta infused with garlic and scallops. Yum!
ingredients: ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
¼ cup coarsely chopped fresh basil leaves
directions: Cook and drain pasta following package instructions
Preheat large saute pan on medium 2-3 minutes
Place 2 tablespoons butter, garlic, salt, and red pepper in pan; cook and stir 1-2 minutes or until garlic is lightly browned
Stir into garlic: remaining 1 tablespoon butter and zucchini; cook and stir 3-4 minutes or until zucchini begins to soften
Stir in  , scallops, tomatoes, basil, and 2 tablespoons cheese; cook 2-3 minutes, stirring gently, or until scallops are opaque and firm
Toss pasta with scallop mixture and top with remaining 2 tablespoons cheese
